title: Cachesim
description: This project investigates the simulation of direct-mapped and fully-associative caches in modern processors. It compares performance metrics of different cache architectures implemented in SystemC, C++ and C.

title: Soundscape
description: For my Unreal Engine 4 project, I created an immersive 3D sound world with spatial audio dynamics and interactive soundscapes.
